title: Two swipe brightness slider
content:
Hi, is it possible to change the down-swipe quick tools area to include the brightness slider?
Just with one swipe instead of two?  It would be ideal to have that slider on the bottom of the tools;
being able to access it and put it away with just one swipe.  I use that tool the most; I bet most people
probably do.  (The two swipe method works only half the time, and the auto-brightness is never accurate).
Or even better, since left-to-right swipe has no function, just put the brightness slider there; tucked away on the left side of the screen instead of the top.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
